ground_truth.thought: 获取关于养老金投资的最新研究文章3篇
ground_truth.name: GoogleScholar.search_articles

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'GoogleScholar.search_articles', 'description': 'Search for articles on a specific topic', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the query string'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'num_results', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'number of results to return'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'list of articles, each article is a dict with title, authors, and publication date'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_historical_data', 'description': 'Get historical data for a specific stock', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the stock ticker'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'start_date', 'type': 'DATE', 'description': 'start date for the data'}, {'name': 'end_date', 'type': 'DATE', 'description': 'end date for the data'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'historical data in a dict with dates as keys and prices as values'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_realtime_data', 'description': 'Get real-time data for a specific stock', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the stock ticker'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'price', 'description': 'current price of the stock'}]}, {'name': 'PensionProductComparer.compare_products', 'description': 'Compare different pension products', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'products', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'list of pension products to compare'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparison', 'description': 'comparison results in a dict with product names as keys and scores as values'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要为退休生活选择最佳的养老金产品。首先，获取关于养老金投资的最新研究文章3篇。然后，查询过去五年内不同养老金产品的收益数据。接着，获取当前养老金市场的实时数据。最后，通过养老金产品比较工具，选择最适合我的退休养老金产品。当前这一步的目标是什么?
